deleteConfirmation.title: Delete {{count}} {{type}}
deleteConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} {{type}}? This action cannot be undone and will also remove associated files from storage.

success.title: Deleted {{count}} {{type}}
success.messageSingle: Node and associated file removed successfully
success.messageMultiple: Nodes and associated files removed successfully

error.title: Failed to delete node(s)
error.message: Could not delete the selected node(s): {{error}}
